compression.name: compress_summary
compression.description: Compress lengthy analysis summary while preserving key architectural and technical details
compression.template:
Compress the following analysis summary to approximately {target_length} characters while preserving:
1. Core architectural decisions and design patterns
2. Key module relationships and dependencies
3. Important technical details and constraints
4. Critical insights and findings

Remove redundant details and verbose explanations. Be concise but preserve technical accuracy.

SUMMARY TO COMPRESS:
{long_summary}

COMPRESSED SUMMARY (aim for ~{target_length} chars):
